Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ore

Class ORExpression

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ore.ORExpression
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ORESingleton, OREUnion
public abstract class ORExpression
extends Logic
implements java.lang.Cloneable
This class represents ω-regular expressions.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Details

    • substitute

      public abstract ORExpression substitute​(Proposition p, RegularExpression q)
      Returns an expression obtained by substituting a regular expression for a proposition in this expression.
      Parameters:
      p - the proposition to be replaced
      q - the replacement of p
      Returns:
      the expression obtained by substituting q for p in this expression

    • substitute

      public abstract ORExpression substitute​(java.util.Map<Proposition,​RegularExpression> subst)
      Returns an expression obtained by substituting regular expressions for propositions in this expression.
      Parameters:
      subst - a map from a proposition to its replacement
      Returns:
      the expression obtained by replacing the domain of subst with the range of subst in this expression

    • getLength

      public abstract int getLength()
      Returns the length of this ω-regular expression.
      Returns:
      the length of this ω-regular expression

    • clone

      public abstract ORExpression clone()
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object

    • fromAutomaton

      public static ORExpression fromAutomaton​(Automaton aut)
      Returns an ω-regular expression that is equivalent to an ω-automaton.
      Parameters:
      aut - an ω-automaton
      Returns:
      an ω-regular expression that is equivalent to the specified ω-automaton
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the automaton cannot be converted to a Büchi automaton
      See Also:
      OREExtractor.getOmegaRegularExpression()
